file-version.description: Defines the version of the ble-ad-sample-types.yml file.

sample-types.description: The list of defined BLE sample types in BLE advertisement data.

id.description: The ID of the advertisement sample.

ad-type.description: The byte for the advertisement type. 0x00 if there are sensor data values sent in the advertisement, 0xff if no sensor data is sent.

sample-type.description: The byte for the sample type.

notes.description: Additional notes about the sample type

suitable-for.description: List of devices or sensors this sample type can be used for

byte-offset.description: Byte position of this field within the sample type

data-type.description: Data type of the characteristic value

notes.description: Additional notes about the sample type

conversion.description: Conversion function or parameters to convert value into physical unit

offset.description: The offset of the linear conversion; this is supposed to be a number or a valid python expression

scale.description: The scale of the linear conversion; this is supposed to be a number or a valid python expression
